Posts.Title: Swimming after surgery

Posts.Content: I'm so sorry you and your mum are having to deal with this. Both your and your mum's reactions sound completely normal. Keep talking to her about things, maybe introduce her to this forum so she can see how other people are dealing with a similar diagnosis. I found talking helps but I didn't want to bore people, so letting your mum know you want to talk will help.  The waiting is always the worst, if you have questions about future treatments talk to your breast care nurse. I found I was only told about the next step until I asked, I think they don't want to overload you with too much info. Take care and let us know how it goes.
